name: Riya Sen
description: Chef Riya Sen is a passionate chef who specializes in Italian cuisine. She has a talent for creating delicious, authentic dishes that transport diners to the heart of Italy.

name: Sudipa Chatterjee
description: Chef Sudipa Chatterjee is a classically trained chef who honed his skills in some of the top restaurants in France. He is known for his innovative dishes that combine classic French techniques with modern flavors.

name: Arpita Bhattacharya
description: Chef Arpita Bhattacharya is a rising star in the culinary world. She has a knack for creating beautiful, flavorful dishes that showcase the best ingredients of the season.

name: Anindya Gupta
description: Chef Anindya Gupta is an expert in Korean cuisine. He learned his craft from his grandmother and has spent years perfecting traditional Korean dishes with a modern twist.

name: Debjani Chatterjee
description: Chef Debjani Chatterjee is a master of Latin American cuisine. Her dishes are vibrant, flavorful, and always a hit with diners looking for something new and exciting.

name: Suman Roy
description: Chef Suman Roy is an expert in Chinese cuisine. He is known for his skillful use of spices and bold flavors to create dishes that are both comforting and exciting.
